item.title: CVE-2023-44484|2024-09-06T04:28:15.594Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20blood%20donation%20management%20system
item.description: Online Blood Donation Management System v1.0 is vulnerable to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability. The 'firstName' parameter of the users/register.php resource is copied into the users/member.php document as plain text between tags. Any input is echoed unmodified in the users/member.php response.
